summary:
Obblivion(Aka Johnchi)\'s new ENBs!!!!
V9 version does not have bloom(more optimized)!
ObbliviENBloom has bloom, but it takes a lot of Framerate away : (
descriptionHtml:
Hello, Thank you for downloading the ObbliviENB v.9 and ObbliviENBloom!



first, you need to download D3d9.dll or Injector from ENBseries website(Version 119!!!):
http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm


----------Don\'t use my Personal Preset at first! This Preset is highly unplayable!---------



1. There are total of three presets for you to use;
	a. Core: The base file. It has medium settings for everything; so it takes a moderate amount of Framerate.
	b. Cameraman\'s ENB: It has the highest Graphic Settings, and it also takes the most Framerates. Not recommended for Medium-ranged or lower PCs.
	c. For Low-Ends: Literally, For Low-End PCs. It takes very little Framerate; My current preset.



2. You can customize the ENB in Options folder. You can change values of:
	a. Letterbox/Vignette
	b. Saturation
	c. SSAO style/amount




After putting them into your folder, go to \"My documents->My Games->Skyrim->Skyrimprefs.ini\". Open Skyrimprefs.ini with Notepad. In Skyrimprefs.ini, look for \"bFloatPointRenderTarget=0\". If there aren\'t any, make one. Change the value to \"bFloatPointRenderTarget=1\"


Run the game. Activation is done by \"Shift+F12\"



Photos and Files would be uploaded as soon as possible.
author: Obblivion_aka_Johnchi
